videos.description: Arkansas' Trey Thompson forces a steal and Jaylen Barford dunks it on a fast break giving Arkansas a 23-20 lead.
videos.headline: Arkansas gets the steal and dunks it in transition

videos.description: Kentucky's De'Aaron Fox gets fouled and still makes his shot while driving to the basket.
videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox scores the and-one bucket off a euro-step

videos.description: Kentucky's Edrice Adebayo gets fouled as he scores with a two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Edrice Adebayo fights through traffic for a two-handed dunk

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari discusses his team's play in the post for the 1st half vs Arkansas.
videos.headline: Calipari on Kentucky's post play

videos.description: Kentucky's De'Aaron Fox and Arkansas' Jaylen Barford were given technical fouls following an Arkansas offensive foul.
videos.headline: Technical fouls given out after Isaiah Briscoe is stepped on

videos.description: Kentucky's Edrice Adebayo assists on a one-handed Malik Monk dunk on a fast break.
videos.headline: Monk goes for the one-handed dunk in transition

videos.description: Kentucky's Malik Monk finds De'Aaron Fox for the alley-oop dunk in transtiion.
videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox finishes fast-break with an alley-oop slam

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari discusses his team's strengths on offense in their 97-71 victory over Arkansas.
videos.headline: No. 6 Wildcats finding their groove

videos.description: Postgame Breakdown of Kentucky's 2nd half defensive play and De'Aaron Fox's performance in Kentucky's win over Arkansas.
videos.headline: Postgame Breakdown of Kentucky's 97-71 victory over Arkansas

videos.description: After dropping a career-high 27 points, Kentucky freshman De'Aaron Fox joins SportsCenter to talk about how he's earned the nickname of "The General" through his leadership.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Interview (Fox developing into Kentucky's leader) 2017/01/07 SC

videos.headline: Fox developing into Kentucky's leader

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox scores a career-high 27 points to lead No. 6 Kentucky past Arkansas with ease 91-71.
videos.headline: Kentucky dominates Arkansas in double-digit victory
